TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:
I am working to bring The real Kennedy space center and cape Canaveral and some various pads around the Globe, to KSP VIA Kerbal Konstructs.

it will consist of the launch pads and buildings that are all at the Cape<abbr>, <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr>, And Other pads in the US and around the world</abbr>.

Get Version 2.0 - [At SpaceDock](http://spacedock.info/mod/459/Real%20Launch%20Sites/Real%20KSC%20in%20KSP)

Spoiler

VERSION 2.0

Added *LC14*

New Missile Row Pad

Atlas MSS (animated when you click the top of it)

STOCK SIZE VERSION MAJOR WIP!!!!! 

[at Spacedock](http://spacedock.info/mod/901/Real%20KSC%20in%20KSP%20STOCK?ga=%3CGame+3102+%27Kerbal+Space+Program%27%3E)

NOTE TO GET KERBAL KONSTRUCTS WORKING!!--delete all he mods you have installed except for KK, start your game And make  new save, quit the game and delete the statics folder in the KK directory, install all the mods you want including<abbr style="border-bottom-width:1px;border-bottom-style:dotted;color:rgb(39,42,52);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:13px;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:normal;line-height:20.8px;text-indent:0px;text-transform:none;white-space:normal;word-spacing:0px;background-color:rgb(255,255,255);" title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/<abbr style="border-bottom-width:1px;border-bottom-style:dotted;color:rgb(39,42,52);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:13px;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:normal;line-height:20.8px;text-indent:0px;text-transform:none;white-space:normal;word-spacing:0px;background-color:rgb(255,255,255);" title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>, start the game and you have to use the save that you made on the beginning of this tutorial... that's what fixed it for me

![PBHHFqy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PBHHFqy.jpg)

> 
> with all the launch pads and buildings? in detail?

That is my half-year old unreleased mod. Pics here: [http://imgur.com/a/ZiYfL](http://imgur.com/a/ZiYfL)

I've only done one generic missile row pad with an assortment of Mercury-Atlas, Atlas-Agena and Titan towers, plus a pretty low-quality model of the KSC VAB. You guys have my full permission to use/edit/do whatever you want to those models if you wish. (I believe the source models should be included in that zip as well). It is unreleased and not under any license, so have at it! Credit me if you wish, it's no big deal, just hate to have these things sitting on the backburner for so long.
